note: Gen X. Was once at the acme of technology, now treading water as it “zooms” by at warp speed. Mad at Apple for making them who they are today, only to be bombarded with constant updates and tiny screen keyboards. Did journalism at two major Chicago papers a lifetime ago, now mostly read other people’s work. I spend more time with the folks on MSNBC than I do with anyone else, and have enjoyed watching many of the journalists come into their own over the last 6-7 years.
